query:
SELECT
                id,
                parent_id,
                (SELECT COUNT(id) FROM comments WHERE parent_id = c.id) as "children_count!",
                account_id,
                content,
                created_at,
                updated_at
            FROM comments c
            WHERE 
                post_id = $1 AND
                parent_id IS NULL AND
                ($2::timestamptz IS NULL OR (created_at, id) < ($2, $3))
            ORDER BY created_at DESC, id DESC
            LIMIT $4
